overview:
Chris Autry: CEO of Tailgate Technologies.

Chris has been at the forefront of Internet technologies for 15 years. He was one of the first industry thinkers to champion application design in marketing communications, and was also a pioneer in the use of streaming interactive media as a tool for internet communications.

In 2000 he joined The Boston Consultancy Group (BCG) as a key member of the e-commerce and IT practice area. Having advised many leading Fortune 100 corporations on e-commerce and online marketing strategy, Chris launched into the world of pure play technology: founding Tailgate Technologies in 2007 to enable advertising to evolve into intelligent application.

Chris is a University of Chicago alumnus who enjoys adventure travel and anything to do with being outdoors.

He divides his time between Tailgate Technologies offices in London and Los Angeles.
